### Course Description
This course aims to provide students with both a theoretical and practical understanding of the use of statistics in psychology. The lectures shared here will familiarise students with a range of quantitative statistical methods. Here, you can find content on topics such as t-tests, ANOVA, and regression, among other inferential statistical analyses.

<br>

### Lectures

This course is ongoing; more lectures will be added as the semester progresses.

+ [Exploring Your Data](https://mtruelovehill.github.io/PRM/Lectures/Week01_ExploringData_Lecture.html#1)
+ [Introduction to Null-Hypothesis Statistical Testing](https://mtruelovehill.github.io/PRM/Lectures/Week03_NHST_lecture.html#1)
